page.title: 10SUDBURY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: { Sudbury school}opened in{1831.} Some people's mums and dads used to come to this school, we have looked in the{log books}and found lots of different names.{ The school has changed a lot over the years while it has been open.There used to be a lot of children here, but now there are only forty-one because the number has cut down rapidly over the years. There used to be secondary age pupils, but now they go to Hatton School and there are only{infants and {juniors. }In Victorian times children wrote on slates and used copybooks and were caned for copying. Now we use {computers}and{calculators.} Our work is about things that interest us. We do{projects. }We find out about things from books, paint pictures and write poems. These computer entries are part of a project on our village.
